umbTextpage.bodyText:
Azure 服务计量 GUID 更新列表

为了更好的管理 Azure 服务的定价，我们计划对您正在使用的 Azure 服务计量 GUID 进行更新。

请注意，此更新不会影响计费，Azure 服务定价将保持不变，但会有部分计量名称或计量 GUID 发生改变。

SQL 数据库托管实例

新的 GUID 将于 2019 年 9 月 1 日生效。

Service Name Service Type Resource Name Region Name Direct Unit Of Measure Resource GUID
SQL Database Managed Instance Business Critical - Compute Gen5 vCore CN East 2 1 Hour 5e985b45-f140-4e48-8551-8ac2def0cfc8
SQL Database Managed Instance Business Critical - Storage Data Stored CN East 2 1 GB/Month 44535042-e296-483a-ae24-d0b78e044a57

SQL Database Managed Instance General Purpose - Compute Gen5 vCore CN North 2 1 Hour ad72d46d-7bb9-404b-bc9e-93905fdbd4d8
SQL Database Managed Instance General Purpose - Compute Gen5 vCore CN East 2 1 Hour ee6a6377-481e-49eb-b68a-03a9265d232a
SQL Database Managed Instance General Purpose - Storage Data Stored CN North 2 1 GB/Month 98a30e75-1ce9-40dc-86e4-57ec14065e22
SQL Database Managed Instance General Purpose - Storage Data Stored CN East 2 1 GB/Month 887c717e-9244-4827-a46e-3e2fa6567c5a
SQL Database Managed Instance General Purpose - SQL License vCore 1 Hour e52d6d04-c8a8-4387-9e76-0ceab532a294
SQL Database Managed Instance Business Critical - SQL License vCore 1 Hour 397a6596-d1a8-48db-a14f-66313b9b5619
